document_data.mainbody:
Fovem was a thief and a seller of black market goods from the city of Athkatla in Amn in the late 14 century DR.
He was a human man who worse tan and brown thieves garb and leathers.
Fovem offered items at reduced prices. His stock included several types of weapons and armor, including dangerous potions of explosions.
In the , Fovem peddled his illicit goods in Athkatlas Wave District, just outside the Galvarey Estate, secretly a Harper safehouse. He also offered information on the city and its goings-on for a price of 50 gold pieces. Fovem was not affiliated with the Shadow Thieves of Athkatla nor the new emergent mysterious rival guild however, he claimed that the Grandmaster of the Shadow Thieves sat on the Council of Six and Renal the Bloodscalp ran the guilds daily activities.
